markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 20"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Sky Hammer](/Equipment.aspx?ID=394)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 602 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 70,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Weapon** [Warhammer](/Weapons.aspx?ID=47)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

The sturdy, steel head of this _+3 major striking [flaming](/Equipment.aspx?ID=295) [shock](/Equipment.aspx?ID=303) [orichalcum](/Equipment.aspx?ID=378) [warhammer](/Weapons.aspx?ID=47)_ is shaped like a blazing comet.

<document level="2" id="action-219" />

**Craft Requirements** Supply a casting of _fireball_ (6th level), and the initial raw materials must include 12,375 gp of orichalcum.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Sky Hammer
